cache-redis-subtitle: Monitor Redis health, local cache storage, and multi-site isolation from one cockpit.
cache-redis-card-connection-hint-online: Connection to the Redis coordinator is healthy.
cache-redis-card-connection-hint-offline: Redis is unreachable. Verify the service before continuing.
cache-redis-card-keys-hint: All logical databases summed across namespaces.
cache-redis-card-hit-rate-hint: Reads served from Redis compared to misses.
cache-redis-performance-desc: Connections, command cadence, latency, and eviction pressure.
cache-redis-slowlog-desc: Recent Redis commands exceeding the slowlog threshold.
cache-redis-slowlog-empty: No slow commands were logged in this window.
cache-redis-local-desc: File cache, object cache, and opcode cache footprint.
cache-redis-tool-clear-file-desc: Remove page fragments and static render files.
cache-redis-tool-clear-object-desc: Drop serialized objects stored on disk.
cache-redis-tool-clear-opcode-desc: Clear OPcache / bytecode caches from PHP.
cache-redis-site-desc: Per-site Redis namespaces and local cache usage.
cache-redis-site-empty: No site cache metrics were discovered.
cache-redis-site-footer: Each site is isolated by prefix; use prewarm before broadcasting content.
cache-redis-prewarm-desc: Queued URL patterns and their execution status.
cache-redis-expiration-desc: TTL strategies applied to cache namespaces.
cache-redis-keys-desc: Inspect sampled Redis keys, TTLs, and payload sizes.
cache-redis-heatmap-desc: Hot key density per site over the last hour.
cache-redis-alerts-desc: Warnings aggregated from Redis and local cache telemetry.
cache-redis-alerts-empty: Everything looks healthy. No cache alerts raised.
cache-redis-alert-key-explosion-desc: %d site(s) exceed the safe key threshold.
cache-redis-alert-redis-offline-desc: All cache operations will miss until the Redis service is restored.
cache-redis-alert-memory-critical-desc: Utilisation reached %s. Expand memory or evict keys immediately.
cache-redis-alert-memory-warn-desc: Utilisation reached %s. Review eviction policy or trim namespaces.
cache-redis-alert-local-storage-desc: Consider pruning file/object caches or moving to external storage.
